game_description: Forklift is a useful and powerful industrial truck used to lift and move materials over short distances, which is also called lift truck, fork truck, fork hoist and forklift truck. Forklifts have become an indispensable piece of equipment in manufacturing and warehousing. Up for a real forklift gaming experience? We worked really hard and thoroughly to enable you great forklift simulator realistic graphics in one of the best forklift games. REAL WAREHOUSE EXPERIENCE Not only that you need to ride the forklift, you need to manually move boxes like in a real warehouse. Be careful in how you manage the forklift, you can cause different problems in this realistic experience. FULL CONTROL In one of the most best warehouse and logistics simulator, you will have full control over the forklift. That is why we can proudly say that this is one of the best forklift games . All you need to do is show that you have the skills and orientation to ride the forklift. STUNNING GRAPHICS The graphics is one of the best things and is making this simulator one of the best forklift truck games. If you're looking for a forklift demo game, you'll rarely find a better and more realistic experience. ENJOY THE FREE RIDE Enjoy the game as one of the best free forklift demo available on VR today. FEATURES: – Realistic forklift simulator – Real warehouse conditions – Amazing HD graphics – Great controls over the vehicle Enjoy this real warehouse experience in the stunning forklift.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Portugal), Romanian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish
review_1: I was looking forward to playing the game but then I couldn’t get in the vehicle and when I did There was no way to strap in so I kept falling out of the back hopefully they fix it then I’ll come back and play because it seems like a fun game. WONT RECOMMEND UNTIL THE BUGS ARE FIXED!!!!
review_2: This game was looking good, I loved the fact that finally there was going to be a forklift sim but no button allowed me to be strapped to the forklift, I had to drive a little then stop and walk forward and repeat, I had no other problems but I enjoyable because of this one issue.
review_3: It's a shame, the simulation looks amazing (the movement is poor and some movement lag is never good to avoid motion sickness) but I couldn't enjoy the experience... why? BECAUSE I NEVER MANAGED TO GET IN THE VEHICLE! Really, no tutorial, no simple solution, no easy or logical IX, well it was easier to climb on top of the bobcat and still nothing worked.
review_4: All I could do was turn it on and use the controls but nothing else. My size could not be changed. Teleporting was buggy
review_5: The game might or might not be fine, I cannot really evaluate as the joystick sensitivity is just way too high. I can recommend raising the time required to a joystick turn to be registered as currently by default settings I'm unable to control the game at all as I can't turn. This isn't really a problem in any other game, like I've had a few ghost input, but in this game every right turn cause a left right after it. After fiddling with controller calibration it can be reduced quite a bit, but it's still present and annoying, and it is caused by a too naive way of handling imput, as no other app or game have this problem.
